text: Ettore Peretti (14 March 1958, Costermano sul Garda – 28 January 2018) was an Italian politician. Born on 14 March 1958, Peretti was a member of the Union of the Centre. He served on the Chamber of Deputies between 1994 and 2008, and died of a heart attack while playing tennis on 28 January 2018. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from the Province of Verona Category:Union of the Centre (2002) politicians Category:Deputies of Legislature XV of Italy Category:Venetian politicians
title: Ettore Peretti
